flawed_nl_solution:
The writer is going to write 518 questions + 476 questions = <<518+476=994>>994 questions in 7 days.
He should aim to do 994 questions / 7 days = <<994/7=124>>124 questions/day.
#### 124

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 142, not 124. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
